title: Create web-based gaming application

requirements.text: Implement user authentication system using Internet Identity to allow players to create accounts and log in securely
acceptanceCriteria: Users can authenticate using Internet Identity
User session persists across page refreshes
Login and logout functionality works correctly

requirements.text: Create a game lobby system where authenticated players can view available game rooms and join matches
acceptanceCriteria: Lobby displays list of available game rooms
Players can create new game rooms
Players can join existing game rooms
Room status updates in real-time

requirements.text: Build a turn-based tactical combat game with a top-down 2D or simple 3D battlefield view where players take turns moving and attacking
acceptanceCriteria: Game board renders with player positions visible
Players can move their character on their turn
Players can perform attack actions against opponents
Turn system alternates between players correctly
Game state updates and persists on backend

requirements.text: Implement a health and damage system where players have health points that decrease when hit, and game ends when a player reaches zero health
acceptanceCriteria: Each player starts with defined health points
Damage calculations reduce health correctly
Game declares winner when opponent health reaches zero
Health status visible to all players

requirements.text: Create a leaderboard system that tracks player wins, losses, and ranking across all matches
acceptanceCriteria: Player statistics stored and updated after each match
Leaderboard displays top players by win rate or score
Individual player stats accessible from profile view
Rankings update correctly after matches complete

requirements.text: Design a cohesive visual theme with bold, energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography, and tactical military-inspired UI elements that create an immersive combat gaming atmosphere
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent color palette applied across all pages
Typography choices support readability and gaming aesthetic
UI elements have tactical/military styling
Visual theme creates cohesive experience throughout app

constraints: Use turn-based mechanics instead of real-time shooting
Keep game scope suitable for web browser environment
Do not implement real-time WebSocket communication
Do not use external game engines or third-party game services
nonGoals: Voice chat or social media integration

required: Tactical combat-themed hero banner with dramatic battlefield atmosphere (hero-banner.dim_1200x400.png)
Gaming app logo featuring bold 'Fire Fight' text with tactical military styling (logo.dim_256x256.png)
Game lobby background with strategic map aesthetic (lobby-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Player avatar placeholder icon with soldier silhouette (avatar-default.dim_128x128.png)
